item.title: Dangerous cover with large gaps surrounnding it. ng it, 20th October
item.description:
This is 4th time reporting this very dangerous issue outside 100 northumberland Avenue welling. there is now a large puddle forming in the large gaps that surround the BT cover.

item.title: Very noisy Thames Water manhole cover., 20th October
item.description:
Very noisy Thames Water manhole cover. Makes a loud noise up and down the road every time a vehicle passes over it, much worse with trucks and buses. Now tarmac surround is begining to crack and break up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80, Tulse Hill, Tulse Hill, London
